document.masterDocTitle: Biruta Rasiņa’s collection of scale insects (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha Coccomorpha) at the Latvian National Museum of Natural History, including type material of several species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Biruta Rasiņa’s collection of scale insects (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha Coccomorpha) at the Latvian National Museum of Natural History, including type material of several species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Ethanol-preserved material.
Malus
‘Baltā Dzidrā’: Skursteņmuiža surroundings (Lielvircavas pagasts)— 5502 ( 5.vii.1949 , leg. P. Upītis).

Remarks. On the envelope of Sample no. 4607 was written that under the
Lepidosaphes ulmi
scales were
Hemisarcoptes malus (Shimer)
adult mites and their larvae. The fate of the material of these mites is unknown.

LITHUANIA : dry material.
Calluna vulgaris
: Tauragės apskritis , Puželiai surroundings—4519 (
24. viii.1946
)
.
